articles.title: German businesses, unions oppose boycott of Russian oil and natural gas - CBC News
articles.description: Germany's employers and unions have joined together in opposing an immediate European Union ban on natural gas imports from Russia over its invasion of Ukraine, saying such a move would lead to factory shutdowns and the loss of jobs in the bloc's largest econ…
